subtitle: Fresh apples and plums are used in this recipe.

method.text: Sift the flour, salt and cinnamon into a bowl. Rub in the butter. Stir in the sugar. Stir in the chopped pears, plums and walnuts. Finally, gently stir in the eggs.

Spoon the mixture into a greased and lined 20 cm round deep cake tin. Place in the oven for 50-60 min, until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean. Leave to cool slightly. Then turn out onto a wire rack. Dredge the top with Demerara sugar.

title: Windfall cake
